query.statement:
SELECT LIFNR ,NAME1 ,'I' AS FLAG ,'' AS GUBUN ,'' AS ACTSS ,'' AS TYPE ,'' AS NAMEE ,'' AS NAMET ,'' AS NAMEC ,'' AS POSIC ,'' AS POSIT ,'' AS POSIE ,'' AS TEMNO ,'' AS JUMIN ,'' AS ADDRE ,'' AS CELLP ,'' AS MAJOR ,'' AS CAREY ,'' AS CAREM ,'' AS ENTER ,'' AS INSU1 ,'' AS INSU2 ,'' AS INSU3 ,'' AS INSU4 ,'' AS PICTU ,'' AS INSUNO ,'' AS INSUNM ,'' AS PICINSU ,'A' AS STATS ,'' AS INSU_FILE_PATH ,'' AS INSU_SIZE ,'' AS TU_FILE_PATH ,'' AS TU_SIZE ,'' AS DIRECT ,'' AS INDIRECT ,'' AS FDATE1 ,'' AS FDATE2 ,'' AS FDATE3 ,'' AS FDATE4 ,'' AS FDATE5 ,'' AS FDATE6 ,'' AS TDATE1 ,'' AS TDATE2 ,'' AS TDATE3 ,'' AS TDATE4 ,'' AS TDATE5 ,'' AS TDATE6 ,'' AS ITEM1 ,'' AS ITEM2 ,'' AS ITEM3 ,'' AS ITEM4 ,'' AS ITEM5 ,'' AS ITEM6 -- ,'' AS ZTEAM
,'' AS BIRTH ,'' AS PERKEY ,'' AS PSPID ,'' AS ZSITE_NM ,'' AS LOCALMAN ,'' AS FOREIGNER ,'' AS NATION , '' AS DUTY , '' AS SFT_SHOE , '' AS SP_SUIT , '' AS SP_SUIT2 , '' AS WT_SUIT , '' AS WT_SUIT2 , '' AS VEST
FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
